entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle or rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing drizzle ending in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
